meaningMnemonic: Every time a government is <kanji>years old</kanji>er, it calculates the money that has <kanji>enter</kanji>ed its coffers. This is the <vocabulary>annual revenue</vocabulary> received by national and local governments.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
